solana_the_enlightened.name: Solana
solana_the_enlightened.description: A wise and powerful spirit of the sun, Solana brings light and warmth to the world.

iris_the_prismatic.name: Iris
iris_the_prismatic.description: A vibrant spirit of the rainbow, Iris embodies the beauty and diversity of nature.

marina_the_arcane.name: Marina
marina_the_arcane.description: A mystical goddess of the sea, Marina commands the tides and wields powerful arcane magic.

dahlia_the_reaper.name: Dahlia
dahlia_the_reaper.description: A mysterious goddess of death, Dahlia guides souls to the afterlife with grace and dignity.

valka_the_feral.name: Valka
valka_the_feral.description: A wild-hearted warrior, Valka channels primal strength through fang, hide, and fury.

kira_the_bladebound.name: Kira
kira_the_bladebound.description: Swift and silent, Kira lives by the edge of her blade and the instincts of her bloodline.

brielle_the_bulwark.name: Brielle
brielle_the_bulwark.description: A steadfast defender, Brielle holds the line with grit, steel, and quiet resolve.

elowen_the_antlered.name: Elowen
elowen_the_antlered.description: A quiet presence in the glade, Elowen communes with ancient spirits beneath her sacred crown.

astraea_the_radiant.name: Astraea
astraea_the_radiant.description: A goddess of judgment and light, Astraea descends with blade in hand to cleanse all shadow from the realm.

velindra_the_bloodveil.name: Velindra
velindra_the_bloodveil.description: A goddess of carnage and crimson rites, Velindra walks veiled in shadow and soaked in silence.

seraphine_the_wildflame.name: Seraphine
seraphine_the_wildflame.description: A goddess of nature's wrath, Seraphine commands flame and feather with primal divinity and feral grace.

lysette_the_chromeveil.name: Lysette
lysette_the_chromeveil.description: A goddess of radiant synthesis, Lysette embodies elegance forged from starlight, silver, and sacrifice.

zelha_the_thorned.name: Zelha
zelha_the_thorned.description: Crowned in chrome and curved in cruelty, Zelha rules not through mercy—but through menace and allure.

solenne_the_hallowed.name: Solenne
solenne_the_hallowed.description: A goddess of grace and devotion, Solenne blesses the world in silence, her light unmarred by time or conflict.

nyria_the_dragonchant.name: Nyria
nyria_the_dragonchant.description: Bearer of dragon-song and scale-bound melody, Nyria weaves enchantments through fang, string, and spell.

mira_the_herbalist.name: Mira
mira_the_herbalist.description: With a basket of greens and a shimmer of light, Mira heals wounds the old-fashioned way—gently, and with care.

rinna_the_mixer.name: Rinna
rinna_the_mixer.description: Rinna isn’t a fighter, but give her a test tube and five minutes and something will explode or heal—maybe both.

maelis_the_lanternbearer.name: Maelis
maelis_the_lanternbearer.description: Maelis walks the forgotten paths, her lantern guiding the lost and warding what lurks beyond the dark.
